faq.title: Pricing Questions Answered
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our transparent pricing, flexible plans, and billing options.

items.question: Can I try the service for free before purchasing?
items.answer: Absolutely! {siteName} gives every new user {welcomeCredits} free credits to test our AI image generation capabilities. No credit card required - just sign up and start creating amazing images right away.

items.question: Do all credits work with every feature on the platform?
items.answer: Yes! Whether you get credits from a subscription or buy them as one-time packs, they all work the same way. You can use any credits for any AI image generation feature - no restrictions, no limitations.

items.question: Do one-time credit purchases ever expire?
items.answer: Never! Your one-time credit purchases are yours forever. Take your time, create at your own pace - there's no pressure or expiration dates to worry about.

items.question: How do annual subscription credits get delivered?
items.answer: We deliver your annual subscription credits monthly, so you get a fresh allowance each month throughout your subscription. Each plan has different monthly amounts - check the pricing cards above to see exactly what you'll get.

items.question: Can I buy extra credits if I'm already on a subscription?
items.answer: Of course! Sometimes you need more credits for big projects. You can purchase additional one-time credit packs anytime, even with an active subscription. Perfect for those busy creative months!
